evidence_example.title: Demo QP for DPs problem with USART output
evidence_example.small_descr: This demo implements a state machine for Dining Philosophers Problem (DPP)
evidence_example.long_descr:
Demo that shows how to use the QP framework. This demo implements the Dining Philosophers Problem (DPP) example using six concurrent active objects. The behavior of each object is implemented through a state machine. The output is through the RS232 connector of STM32F4DIS-BB base board.
  • User Button is used to pause and resume the application;
  • STM32F4DIS-BB RS232 connector is used to prints the state of each philosopher.
Hardware:
  • STM32F407 Discovery board.
  • TM32F4DIS-BB base board.
